column1: Tim was in the kitchen, ready to make lunch. Tim wanted to make a big bowl of pasta. The pasta box was full. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Tim does not see the bird.
Fiona was at the park with her friends. They wanted to play a game of soccer. The ball they had was clean and shiny. A squirrel runs across the field. Fiona does not see the squirrel.

Olivia was at the park, sitting on a bench. Olivia wanted to feed the ducks with her bag of bread. The bread was fresh and smelled good. A colorful butterfly lands on the bench next to Olivia. Olivia does not see the colorful butterfly.
Ina was at the park, sitting on a bench. Ina wanted to watch the birds play. A small, pink bird was awake on a tree branch. A dog runs past Ina, chasing a ball. Ina does not see the dog.
John was at the park, sitting on a bench. John wanted to propose to his girlfriend and marry her. His ring box was in his cap. A butterfly lands on John's shoulder. John does not see the butterfly.

Jill was at the park, watching the kids play. She wanted to take a video of her son's first time on the swing. The camera was off. A butterfly lands on the swing next to Jill's son. Jill does not see the butterfly.
Ben was at the ranch, looking after the animals. Ben wanted to ride his favorite horse. The saddle was not heavy. An unusual bird lands on the ranch fence. Ben does not see the unusual bird.
Vinny was in the gloomy hall of his school. He wanted to zoom around on his new roller skates. The hall was empty. The school bell rings loudly. Vinny does not hear the school bell ring.
Fred was at a fun fair, excited to play games. Fred wanted to win a big teddy bear as a prize. The game machine was on. A clown starts performing nearby. Fred does not see the clown.
Sam was at the beach, having a picnic. Sam wanted to visit his friend after eating his sandwich. The sandwich was tasty. A dog runs across the beach, chasing a ball. Sam does not see the dog.
Quin was at the park with his friends. Quin wanted to show his friends he was brave. The park's gate was locked. A squirrel runs across the park. Quin does not see the squirrel.
Sam was in the park, near the big inflatable castle. Sam wanted to jump and play in the castle. The castle was big and inflated. A squirrel runs past Sam. Sam does not see the squirrel.

Queenie was in the park, looking at the beautiful flowers. Queenie wanted to pick a green leaf to make a print for her art project. The leaf she saw was fresh and green. A squirrel runs up a nearby tree. Queenie does not see the squirrel.

Xander was in the park, playing with his friends. He wanted to build a big sand structure. The sand was wet and good for building. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Xander does not see the butterfly.

Bella was in the library, looking for a good book to read. Bella wanted to find an attractive book to read before her nap. The book shelf was full of books. A child drops a toy car near Bella. Bella does not see the toy car.
Zara was at a birthday party. Zara wanted to give her friend a gift. The gift was securely wrapped. A clown arrives at the party. Zara does not see the clown.

Dave was in a lively party at his friend's house. Dave wanted to go upstairs to get his coat. The door upstairs was unlocked. A dog starts barking loudly at the party. Dave does not hear the dog barking.
Mabel was near a swamp, looking for frogs. Mabel wanted to catch a frog to show her friends. The swamp was still and quiet. A bird flies over the swamp. Mabel does not see the bird.

Xander was at the doctor's office for a check-up. Xander wanted to be a good patient and stay calm. The doctor's light switch was off. A cat walks into the doctor's office. Xander does not see the cat.
Ed was at a birthday party. Ed wanted to tell a funny joke to his friends. The juice jug was full. A piece of cake falls from the table. Ed does not see the piece of cake fall.
Zara was in her garden, ready to plant some flowers. Zara wanted to dig holes with her spade. The spade was strong. A butterfly lands on a flower in Zara's garden. Zara does not see the butterfly.
Xena was at a party, dancing with her friends. Xena wanted to drink her yellow lemonade. The lemonade cup was full. A purple balloon pops at the party. Xena does not hear the balloon pop.

Kira was in the park, playing with her friendly dog, Max. Kira wanted to throw a bright, plastic ball for Max to fetch. The ball was very bright. A squirrel runs across the park. Kira does not see the squirrel.
Luke was in the forest, looking for wood to build a treehouse. Luke wanted to find a big, strong tree to cut. The saw was sharp. A squirrel runs past Luke. Luke does not see the squirrel.
Amy was at the park, sitting on the bench. Amy wanted to play with her red balloon. The balloon was big and full of air. A dog starts barking loudly near Amy. Amy does not hear the dog barking.

Jack was at the park, having fun on his own. Jack wanted to hop on the big man statue in the park. The man statue smelled neutral. A dog runs across the park barking loudly. Jack does not see the dog.

Jill was at a party with her friends. Jill wanted to tell a funny joke to make everyone laugh. Her friend, Tom, was awake and listening. A balloon pops loudly in the party. Jill does not hear the balloon pop.

Bob was in a busy city, looking for a place to eat. Bob wanted to try a new food place. The food place was open. A street performer starts playing music nearby. Bob does not hear the street performer.
Wendy was in the living room, doing her morning yoga. Wendy wanted to check her yoga poses in the mirror. The mirror was standing upright. The doorbell rings. Wendy does not hear the doorbell ring.
Carl was in a park, playing soccer with his friends. Carl wanted to shoot the ball into the goal. The ball was on the ground. A squirrel runs up a tree nearby. Carl does not see the squirrel.

Kira was in the forest, looking for wood to build a fire. Kira wanted to find a tree to cut down with her axe. The axe was sharp. A bird starts singing loudly in a tree nearby. Kira does not hear the bird singing.

Rita was in the library, looking for a good book to read. Rita wanted to find a book on the top shelf of the bookcase. The bookcase was organized and neat. A cat walks into the library. Rita does not see the cat.

Zara was in her room, cleaning up her toys. Zara wanted to put her teddy in its tidy toy trap. The toy trap was empty. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Zara does not see the butterfly.
Ben was in the garden, sitting on a rock. Ben wanted to build a birdhouse. The bag of nails smelled like fresh metal. A butterfly lands on Ben's drawing. Ben does not see the butterfly.

Ed was at the park, ready to ride his scooter. Ed wanted to ride his scooter all around the park. The scooter was upright, ready to be ridden. A child starts flying a kite in the park. Ed does not see the child with the kite.

Max was at an ice cream shop on a hot day. Max wanted to buy an expensive, sweet ice cream cone. The ice cream cone was cold. A mist starts to fall outside the ice cream shop. Max does not see the mist.

Xander was in the garden, admiring the flowers. Xander wanted to make a bouquet of smooth poppies for his mom. The poppies were sweet smelling. A butterfly lands on a nearby rose. Xander does not see the butterfly.
Pia was at the park, ready to have a picnic. Pia wanted to eat her sandwich with cheese. The cheese was solid and cold. A butterfly lands on a flower near Pia. Pia does not see the butterfly.

Quinn was at the park, standing on a high bridge. Quinn wanted to drop a small toy figure into the river below. The figure was in his hand. A butterfly lands on the bridge railing. Quinn does not see the butterfly.

Gabe was in the park, ready to fly his kite. Gabe wanted to let his kite fly high in the sky. The kite's string was tightly wound on the reel. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Gabe does not see the butterfly.

Tanya was at the beach, sitting in her small hut. Tanya wanted to draw a picture of her hut on a big piece of paper. The paper was straight and smooth. A crab scuttles into the hut. Tanya does not see the crab.
Zara was at the zoo, close to the monkey cage. Zara wanted to feed the monkeys. The bag of peanuts was full. A parrot squawks loudly from a nearby tree. Zara does not hear the parrot squawk.
Yara was at her house, getting ready for a party. Yara wanted to invite all her friends to the party. The veil on Yara's head was still. A cat walks into the room. Yara does not see the cat.

Greta was at the park, taking pictures with her camera. Greta wanted to print a unique picture of a butterfly. The camera had a sweet smell from the perfume Greta used. A squirrel scurries past Greta, chattering loudly. Greta does not hear the squirrel.

Lisa was at a big party, feeling shy. Lisa wanted to join the fun and clap along with the music. The cap on her water bottle was twisted tight. The music at the party changes to a slow song. Lisa does not hear the slow song.
Ina was at a lively party with her friends. Ina wanted to light a fire in the fireplace. The match box was full. The doorbell rings. Ina does not hear the doorbell ring.
Daisy was at the park with her friendly dog, Max. Daisy wanted to play fetch with Max. The dog's toy was on the ground. A little girl comes over to pet Max. Daisy does not see the little girl.
Ben was at the park, playing with his friends. Ben wanted to share his new toy belt with his friends. The belt was in his bag. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Ben does not see the butterfly.

Dora was in the park, ready to go for a run. Dora wanted to use the path that goes around the lake. The path was clear and free of ice. A delicious smell of freshly baked cookies wafts from a nearby bakery. Dora does not smell the cookies.

Zara was in the park, looking at a four-leaf clover she had found on the ground. Zara wanted to keep the lucky clover safe in her locket. The locket was empty. A butterfly lands on Zara's shoulder. Zara does not see the butterfly.
